title: Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve V Neck
title_original: Floral Embroidered Wedding Dresses for Bride Women 2025 Long Chiffon Short Sleeve V Neck A Line Bridal Gown

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #1,192,522 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #456 in Wedding Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Wedding Dresses

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really is a beautiful dress. Quality with room to alter in case you need to.
items.body: The dress really is beautiful quality. It has a long train. I wore a petticoat under to lift out the skirt a little so i wouldn't trip and to show off the beautiful embroidery. For a dress in only going to wear twice in my life this was a wonderful selection. The seller emailed me after i bought it to ask for custom measurements. I opted not to use them and sewed my own adjustments. I sewed up the front a little so there was not much cleavage, sewed the sleeves so they would stay open around my arms and added ribbons to tie across my back. Stitching on the dress is secure. The embroidery is light. It isn't super thick and moves with the dress. It adds a rustic look. My dress was true to color. I ordered ivory and it was an off white. I would argue it was a little light for ivory but it didn't look stark white. The side panels are a mesh that is a dark ivory almost light brown. If that bothers you, take it to a seamstress to fix it. The panels are see though and that didn't bother me. I don't know why the review says the wrong weight. I am 260lbs. Read more
items.author: Christine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dress is so stunning!! It’s even more gorgeous in person.
items.body: This dress was such a high quality. They took my measurements and the length was perfect. I still had to have it altered. No one believes it was bought from amazon Read more
items.author: Georgia Peach

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful material, good quality, but sloppy leaves
items.body: The media could not be loaded. A very nice quality material. The lining and the outside fabric are beautiful and comfortable. I was expecting the leaves and vines to be better quality, but they just look like someone rush-stitched them. Very sloppy looking. However, from far away you can really tell that they look bad. Overall a beautiful dress, but they sent me the wrong size so I will be returning. Read more
items.author: Mel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: Loved the dress and GREAT customer service. They were very good with communicating and getting me the dress quickly. It was true to size too! Read more
items.author: chanagroh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Felt like a fairy queen
items.body: This dress was perfect for my hippie wedding in the forest. Very comfortable to wear and inexpensive to alter. People were blown away that it was so inexpensive because it looks ten times the price. Only regret is not getting a bustle put in. Read more
items.author: Faith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Wedding Dress!
items.body: I lovedddd this dress for my elopement. I got the champagne color. It’s beautiful, but keep in mind it does NOT stretch. I recommend ordering a size up if you can. The material felt nice and the details were amazing. Worth every penny. I’m usually a XXL-XXXL in dresses and I got the size 22 and it was a snug fit, but did fit! Read more
items.author: Tara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Floral Wedding Dress!
items.body: Nice quality material, colorful floral embroidered is beautiful on the dress, comfortable to wear, I love this wedding dress very much. it worked perfect for my wedding Read more
items.author: Liz

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White, Ivory, Black, Champagne. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
